WorkItem.Description:
Several bits of wording in the guardian 'summary' section are wrong.  I think there was some confusion about DR standing for damage reduction rather than diminishing returns.

Pre-Dodge DR should be Pre-DR dodge.  
The mouseover should be changed to "The amount of dodge before diminishing returns".

Post-Dodge DR should be Post-DR dodge.  
The mouseover should be changed to "The amount of dodge after diminishing returns; this is what is shown on the character sheet."

Pre-Armor DR mouseover should have the additional note of "This is what is shown on the character sheet".

I'd argue that "pre-armor DR" should be named "lvl armor DR" and "post-armor DR" should be named "boss armor DR".

It might also be worth adding mouse over for total mitigation specifying that it is using the "post-armor DR"/"boss armor DR" for this.
